svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Subscriptions to the Montreal Protocol by region
Parties subscribed to the Montreal Protocol on substances that deplete the ozone layer (adopted by governments in
1987) by region. The Montreal Protocol aims to reduce and eventually eliminate the emissions of man-made ozone
